help.answer.1: Click on your answer to the question. This also activates Check Answer.
help.answer.1a: Click on your answer to the question. This also activates Check Answer.
help.answer.1b: Click on your answer to the question.
help.answer.2a: Click on two answer choices to answer the question. This also activates Check Answer.
help.answer.2b: Click on two answer choices to answer the question.
help.answer.3a: Click on a box in each row of the chart to answer the question.
help.answer.3b: Click on a box in each row of the chart to answer the question.
help.answer.4a: Click on a square in the reading passage to insert the sentence. This also activates Check Answer.
help.answer.4b: Click on a square in the reading passage to insert the sentence.
help.answer.5a: Drag you answer choices to the spaces where they belong. This also activates Check Answer.
help.answer.5b: Drag you answer choices to the spaces where they belong.
help.answer.6: Follow the Directions by clicking on a group of words in the essay question.
help.answer.7: Follow the Directions by clicking on one of the phrases, sentences or paragraphs in the essay.
help.answer.8: Follow the Directions by clicking on each of the errors in the paragraph. You must click on the EXACT number of errors stated in the Directions to see the Check Answer button.
help.answer.9: Type the essay on the screen where the cursor is blinking.
help.change.1: Click on a different answer to change your answer.
help.change.2: Click on an answer to remove it.
help.change.3a: Click on a different answer choice to change your answer. You must click on TWO answers to see the Check Answer button.
help.change.3b: Click on a different answer choice to change your answer.
help.change.4: Click on a different box in the row to change your answer.
help.change.5: Click on the inserted sentence to remove it from the reading passage.
help.change.6: Click on a different square to change your answer.
help.change.7: Drag different answer choices to the spaces where they belong to change your answer.
help.change.8: Click on a different group of words in the essay question to change your answer.
help.change.9: Click on a different phrase, sentence or paragraph in the essay to change your answer.
help.change.10: Answer the question in a different way by changing one or more of your answers.
help.change.11: Click on a word in blue to remove it as an answer.
help.next.1: Click on Next to activate OK.
help.next.2a: Click on Next to move to a new question.
help.next.2b: Click on Next to complete the section.
help.next.3: Click on Next to move to the next screen.
help.next.4: Click on Next to complete the section. If you have not saved your recording at the Checklist screen, your response will be deleted.
help.next.5: Click on Next to save your essay and leave this question.
help.back: Click on Back to return to the last question.
help.ok.1a: Click on OK to record your answer and move to a new question.
help.ok.1b: Click on OK to record your answer and complete the section.
help.ok.2a: Click on OK to move to a new question.
help.ok.2b: Click on OK to complete the section.
help.review: Click on Review to see a list of questions in this section. Use Review to go back to questions you have already seen.
help.text: Click on View Text to review the reading passage.
help.check: Click on Check Answer to see if your answer is correct or incorrect.
help.explain: Click on Explain Answer to see an explanation of the correct answer.
help.listen: Click on Listen to replay the audio.
help.script: Click on View Script to read the script and to replay the audio.
help.listen.script: Click on Listen/View to read the script and to replay the audio.
help.volume: Click on Volume to adjust the volume. Click on, hold, and move the volume indicator to the left and right. To close the volume control, click on another part of the screen.
help.time: Click on Hide or Show to hide or show the time.
help.exit: Click on Section Exit to return to the menu.
help.replay: Click on the Headphone Icon to replay the question audio.
help.view.checklist.1a: Click on Check List to see the checklist. You can save your recording on the checklist screen.
help.view.checklist.1b: Click on a box to enter a checkmark for Yes or No.
help.view.checklist.2a: Click on Check List to see the checklist.
help.view.checklist.2b: Click on a box to enter a checkmark for Yes or No.
help.view.sample.1: Click on Sample Answer to read and listen to a sample answer.
help.view.sample.2: Click on Play Sample to hear the sample answer.
help.view.sample.3: Click on Pause and Stop to pause or stop the audio after it starts to play.
help.view.sample.4: Click on Sample Answer to read a sample response.
help.view.question.1: Click on View Question to see only the question.
help.view.question.2: Click on View Question to see the question.
help.view.text: Click on View Text to see the reading passage.
help.view.notes: Click on Sample Notes to see the sample notes.
help.record.1: Click on Record and speak into the microphone to record your response.
help.record.2: To change your response, click on Record and speak into the microphone. This will erase your previous response.
help.stop: Click on Stop to stop recording.
help.play: Click on Play to hear your response.
help.save: Click on Save Recording to save your response.
help.copy: Click on Copy (after you highlight a block of text) to copy the text from the essay.
help.cut: Click on Cut (after you highlight a block of text) to cut the text from the essay.
help.paste: Click on Paste (after you cut a block of text and click on the spot where you want it to appear) to paste the text.
help.print.1: Click on Print to print a copy of your essay.

drill.write:
<0a>next.3|exit</0a> <1a>next.3|exit</1a> <4a>listen|script|next.3|exit</4a> <5a>listen|script|next.3|exit</5a> <6a>view.text|view.notes|listen|script|next.3|exit</6a> <0b>next.3|exit</0b> <1b>view.question.2|view.notes|next.3|exit</1b> <2b>view.question.2|view.notes|next.3|exit</2b>
answer.1|next.2|back|exit change.1|next.2|back|check|exit change.1|next.2|back|explain|exit next.2|back|exit
answer.6|next.2|back|exit change.8|next.2|back|check|exit change.8|next.2|back|explain|exit next.2|back|exit
answer.7|next.2|back|exit change.9|next.2|back|check|exit change.9|next.2|back|explain|exit next.2|back|exit
answer.7|next.2|back|exit change.9|next.2|back|check|exit change.9|next.2|back|explain|exit next.2|back|exit
answer.7|next.2|back|exit change.9|next.2|back|check|exit change.9|next.2|back|explain|exit next.2|back|exit
answer.8|next.2|back|exit change.10|change.11|next.2|back|check|exit change.10|change.11|next.2|back|explain|exit next.2|back|exit
